verses.verse: The word <WH1697> which <WH834> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> when Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and all <WH3605> his army, <WH2428> and all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776> of his dominion, <WH4480> <WH4475> <WH3027> and all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> fought <WH3898> against <WH5921> Jerusalem, <WH3389> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> thereof, saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel; <WH3478> Go <WH1980> and speak <WH559> to <WH413> Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah, <WH3063> and tell <WH559> <WH413> him, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> Behold, <WH2009> I will give <WH5414> <WH853> this <WH2063> city <WH5892> into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and he shall burn <WH8313> it with fire: <WH784>

And thou <WH859> shalt not <WH3808> escape <WH4422> out of his hand, <WH4480> <WH3027> but <WH3588> shalt surely be taken, <WH8610> <WH8610> and delivered <WH5414> into his hand; <WH3027> and thine eyes <WH5869> shall behold <WH7200> <WH853> the eyes <WH5869> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon, <WH894> and he shall speak <WH1696> with <WH854> thee mouth <WH6310> to mouth, <WH6310> and thou shalt go <WH935> to Babylon. <WH894>

Yet <WH389> hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD, <WH3068> O Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah; <WH3063> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of <WH5921> thee, Thou shalt not <WH3808> die <WH4191> by the sword: <WH2719>

But thou shalt die <WH4191> in peace: <WH7965> and with the burnings <WH4955> of thy fathers, <WH1> the former <WH7223> kings <WH4428> which <WH834> were <WH1961> before <WH6440> thee, so <WH3651> shall they burn <WH8313> odors for thee; and they will lament <WH5594> thee, saying, Ah <WH1945> lord! <WH113> for <WH3588> I <WH589> have pronounced <WH1696> the word, <WH1697> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>
Then Jeremiah <WH3414> the prophet <WH5030> spoke <WH1696> <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> words <WH1697> unto <WH413> Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> in Jerusalem, <WH3389>

When the king <WH4428> of Babylon's <WH894> army <WH2428> fought <WH3898> against <WH5921> Jerusalem, <WH3389> and against <WH5921> all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> that were left, <WH3498> against <WH413> Lachish, <WH3923> and against <WH413> Azekah: <WH5825> for <WH3588> these <WH2007> defensed <WH4013> cities <WH5892> remained <WH7604> of the cities <WH5892> of Judah. <WH3063>

This is the word <WH1697> that <WH834> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> after that <WH310> the king <WH4428> Zedekiah <WH6667> had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> which <WH834> were at Jerusalem, <WH3389> to proclaim <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> unto them;

That every man <WH376> should let <WH853> his manservant, <WH5650> and every man <WH376> <WH853> his maidservant, <WH8198> being a Hebrew <WH5680> or a Hebrewess, <WH5680> go <WH7971> free; <WH2670> that none <WH1115> <WH376> should serve <WH5647> himself of them, to wit, of a Jew <WH3064> his brother. <WH251>

Now when all <WH3605> the princes, <WH8269> and all <WH3605> the people, <WH5971> which <WH834> had entered <WH935> into the covenant, <WH1285> heard <WH8085> that every one <WH376> should let <WH853> his manservant, <WH5650> and every one <WH376> <WH853> his maidservant, <WH8198> go <WH7971> free, <WH2670> that none <WH1115> should serve <WH5647> themselves of them any more, <WH5750> then they obeyed, <WH8085> and let them go. <WH7971>

But afterward <WH310> <WH3651> they turned, <WH7725> and caused <WH853> the servants <WH5650> and the handmaids, <WH8198> whom <WH834> they had let go <WH7971> free, <WH2670> to return, <WH7725> and brought them into subjection <WH3533> for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids. <WH8198>
Therefore the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> to <WH413> Jeremiah <WH3414> from <WH4480> <WH854> the LORD, <WH3068> saying, <WH559>

Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel; <WH3478> I <WH595> made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> your fathers <WH1> in the day <WH3117> that I brought them forth <WH3318> <WH853> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> out of the house <WH4480> <WH1004> of bondmen, <WH5650> saying, <WH559>

At the end <WH4480> <WH7093> of seven <WH7651> years <WH8141> let ye go <WH7971> every man <WH376> <WH853> his brother <WH251> a Hebrew, <WH5680> which <WH834> hath been sold <WH4376> unto thee; and when he hath served <WH5647> thee six <WH8337> years, <WH8141> thou shalt let him go <WH7971> free <WH2670> from <WH4480> <WH5973> thee: but your fathers <WH1> hearkened <WH8085> not <WH3808> unto <WH413> me, neither <WH3808> inclined <WH5186> <WH853> their ear. <WH241>

And ye <WH859> were now <WH3117> turned, <WH7725> and had done <WH6213> <WH853> right <WH3477> in my sight, <WH5869> in proclaiming <WH7121> liberty <WH1865> every man <WH376> to his neighbor; <WH7453> and ye had made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> before <WH6440> me in the house <WH1004> which <WH834> is called <WH7121> by <WH5921> my name: <WH8034>

But ye turned <WH7725> and polluted <WH2490> <WH853> my name, <WH8034> and caused every man <WH376> <WH853> his servant, <WH5650> and every man <WH376> <WH853> his handmaid, <WH8198> whom <WH834> ye had set <WH7971> at liberty <WH2670> at their pleasure, <WH5315> to return, <WH7725> and brought them into subjection, <WH3533> <WH853> to be <WH1961> unto you for servants <WH5650> and for handmaids. <WH8198>

Therefore <WH3651> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> Ye <WH859> have not <WH3808> hearkened <WH8085> unto <WH413> me, in proclaiming <WH7121> liberty, <WH1865> every one <WH376> to his brother, <WH251> and every man <WH376> to his neighbor: <WH7453> behold, <WH2009> I proclaim <WH7121> a liberty <WH1865> for you, saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> to <WH413> the sword, <WH2719> to <WH413> the pestilence, <WH1698> and to <WH413> the famine; <WH7458> and I will make <WH5414> you to be removed <WH2189> into all <WH3605> the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth. <WH776>

And I will give <WH5414> <WH853> the men <WH376> that have transgressed <WH5674> <WH853> my covenant, <WH1285> which <WH834> have not <WH3808> performed <WH6965> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> they had made <WH3772> before <WH6440> me, when <WH834> they cut <WH3772> the calf <WH5695> in twain, <WH8147> and passed <WH5674> between <WH996> the parts <WH1335> thereof,

The princes <WH8269> of Judah, <WH3063> and the princes <WH8269> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> the eunuchs, <WH5631> and the priests, <WH3548> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> of the land, <WH776> which passed <WH5674> between <WH996> the parts <WH1335> of the calf; <WH5695>

I will even give <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH341> and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> their life: <WH5315> and their dead bodies <WH5038> shall be <WH1961> for meat <WH3978> unto the fowls <WH5775> of the heaven, <WH8064> and to the beasts <WH929> of the earth. <WH776>

And Zedekiah <WH6667> king <WH4428> of Judah <WH3063> and his princes <WH8269> will I give <WH5414> into the hand <WH3027> of their enemies, <WH341> and into the hand <WH3027> of them that seek <WH1245> their life, <WH5315> and into the hand <WH3027> of the king <WH4428> of Babylon's <WH894> army, <WH2428> which are gone up <WH5927> from <WH4480> <WH5921> you.

Behold, <WH2009> I will command, <WH6680> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> and cause them to return <WH7725> to <WH413> this <WH2063> city; <WH5892> and they shall fight <WH3898> against <WH5921> it, and take <WH3920> it, and burn <WH8313> it with fire: <WH784> and I will make <WH5414> the cities <WH5892> of Judah <WH3063> a desolation <WH8077> without <WH4480> <WH369> an inhabitant. <WH3427>
